tool_description: Performs find and replace operations on source code with support for regex patterns and case sensitivity options.

source_code.description: The source code to search and modify

find_pattern.description: The text or regex pattern to find

use_regex.description: Whether to treat find_pattern as a regular expression

case_sensitive.description: Whether the search should be case sensitive

replace_all.description: Whether to replace all occurrences or just the first

error_messages: Invalid regex pattern: The find_pattern contains invalid regex syntax.
Empty find pattern: Provide a non-empty find_pattern.
Pattern not found: The find_pattern was not found in the source code.
usage: Specify source_code, find_pattern, and replace_text. Use regex and case sensitivity options as needed for precise matching.

match_locations.description: Line numbers where matches were found
